Author: sintos-compa
Text: hellow fellow pickle lover.  while i do love pickles, they are also not something i'd gorge myself on, per se. but i use them as a tool. I have a huge jar in the fridge and when i get binge cravings i say "sure, binge away ... on pickles!", and like I said, I love pickles, but they are pretty satiating, and i'll respond "hhhmmm.. i don't feel like a pickle binge, i'd rather eat that leftover cheesecake, or the jar of PB.", to which i'll go "well then, i guess you're not THAT hungry". sometimes this staves off my urge to binge completely.  actually, works well with a lot of foods, broccoli and cauliflower for example.
